main event: A military report details a sighting of a single unidentified flying object over the Mediterranean Sea on 8 August 1966.
interesting points: The UFO was initially observed as a glowing ball with a diameter of 100,000 feet,It suddenly reduced in size to 20,000 feet and maintained that size,It had a red fire ball appearance with a blue-green tail,The object passed over the USS Saratoga in just 15 seconds,It impacted in water 30 to 50 miles south of Rome.
witness description: military personnel from the USS Saratoga
